notes: irregular plural 'dei' (often written 'dèi'); also 'numi' in elevated style

example_sentence_italian: Il dio del mare è potente.
example_sentence_english: The god of the sea is powerful.
Ancient gods dwelled in the sky.

notes: definite plural uses 'gli'; irregular plural, often written 'gli dèi'
partitive plural form; irregular plural; often written 'dèi'

example_sentence_italian: La statua del dio è rotta.
example_sentence_english: The statue of the god is broken.

example_sentence_english: I read a book about the god Anubis.

example_sentence_english: The stories of the gods are epic.
